name: NUEBBO
overview:
Nuebbo is a new digital and virtual business card holder for the Internet.

Nuebbo provides you with all of the benefits for which business cards were designed: Maintaining the creative investment in business cards, preserving the visual nature in our memory, with all of the advantages of being a 100% web application. With Nuebbo, you can access all of your contacts including updated details from any device with an Internet connection. Nuebbo card holder makes it easy for you to manage and locate your contacts.

Nuebbo is safe, private, personal and best of allâ€¦ Itâ€™s free! Nuebbo is a digital card holder, not a social network. Nuebbo was designed as a tool for managing your business cards online safely and reliably.

Nuebbo is the first and only solution to integrate contact management functionality with state-of-the-art technology:

â€¢ Automatic Optical Character Recognition (OCR) when uploading a business card

â€¢ Bi-dimensional QR code generation for all of your contacts so you can transfer contact details to your cell by just showing this QR code (QRcard) to your mobile phoneâ€™s camera

â€¢ Geo-location and Point-Of-Interest (POI) for your GPS

â€¢ Free access from your cell to Nuebbo Mobile (auto detection when accessing from mobile devices)

â€¢ Adds video to identity data
